findings.title: Vulnerability: Incorrect versions of Solidity
findings.description: Pragma version 0.6.9 is known to contain severe issues and is not recommended for deployment.

findings.title: Vulnerability: Conformance to Solidity naming conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed (https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.6.9/style-guide.html#namingconventions).

findings.title: Vulnerability: Public function that could be declared external
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.
